comments:
I create a standalone EJB project with its client project. I then tried to  create an EAR project and tried to add the existing ejb and client project to the EAR from the 3 page of the wizard. The following NPE is thrown when i select the client project in the 3 page

Hi Vijay - Can you give me more details?

I was not able to create a standalone ejb and client (this is a smaller problems, that is add to ear is not selected, the client will not be created...  maybe this is right actually but the ui doesn't reflect it).   But then I created a EAR, and used the 3rd page to add the ejb project - worked great....

Fix dropped to todays driver (Not in RC1).
Workaround is to not select the java project in the EAR wizard, and then after the project is created, go to the jar dependency page for the EAR project, and add the java project there....
